name: CarX Street Racing
description:
Featuring realistic Racing on city streets, as well as high-speed drift races, CarX Street is a dynamic, open-world racing game.
Any car can at high speeds or drifted around corners in Street X. Get the best racing skills in this city by joining clubs, defeating bosses, and proving you are the best!

With realistic racing on city street x, high speed drift races, CarX Street is a dynamic and open world racing game.

This game is about racing cars in Street X. Racing at high speeds or drifting around corners is possible with any car. Become the most skilled racer in this city by joining clubs, defeating bosses, and proving you are the best!
The dynamic and open world of CarX Street will make you feel like a truly free street racer. Be the legend of Sunset City and accept the challenge. High-speed Street X Racing, realistic motorways, and street racing.

The physics of car behavior will be unlocked as you build your dream machine using detailed tuning.

Enjoy High Speed Racing X Street open world game !
